original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postLinks as pl, votes as v WHERE p.Id = c.PostId AND c.PostId = pl.PostId AND pl.PostId = v.PostId AND c.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-08-02 23:52:10' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.Score>=-3 AND v.VoteTypeId=2 AND v.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-12 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-08-02 23:52:10'
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.VoteTypeId = 2 AND votes.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-12 00:00:00'
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E4E3 AS SELECT * FROM E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E4.PostId=E3.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.Score >= -3
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E4E3E2 AS SELECT * FROM E4E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E4E3.PostId=E2.Id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E4E3E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4E3E2 WHERE E1.PostId=E4E3E2.PostId)
